text: <a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-1/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-2/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-3/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-4/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-5/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-6/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Therefore let us not sleep, as *do* others; but let us watch and be sober.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-7/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-8/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-9/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-10/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-11/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-12/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-13/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 And to esteem them very highly in love for their work's sake. *And* be at peace among yourselves.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-14/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all *men*.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-15/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 See that none render evil for evil unto any *man*; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all *men*.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-16/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 Rejoice evermore.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-17/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 Pray without ceasing.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-18/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-19/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 Quench not the Spirit.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-20/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 Despise not prophesyings.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-21/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-22/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 Abstain from all appearance of evil.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-23/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and *I pray God* your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-24/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 Faithful *is* he that calleth you, who also will do *it*.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-25/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 Brethren, pray for us.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-26/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-27/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-5-28/" title="1 Thessalonians 5:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ *be* with you. Amen. (*The first *epistle* to the Thessalonians was written from Athens.*)
